headline: Should Shifting Analyst Coverage and Insider Sales Require Action From NetApp (NTAP) Investors?
summary: Oppenheimer recently initiated coverage on NetApp with a 'Perform' rating, while J.P. Morgan maintained a Buy rating ahead of the company's upcoming earnings report, which is expected to show slight growth in earnings per share and revenue compared to last year. A noteworthy aspect is a shift in analyst sentiment, including newly updated coverage and recent insider share sales by top executives, drawing increased investor attention to NetApp's near-term outlook. We'll explore how revised...
